tasks.task: Chili pepper farming conversation with Mr. John Tepeno
subtasks: Start conversation with Mr. John Tepeno
Discuss Mr. John's 2 acres of chili pepper in Adan East District
Talk about the dry season and farming conditions
Mention the use of cowdung fertilizer
Discuss the use of chicken stock and flower nutrients
Talk about crop protection and avoiding contamination
Address the challenge of seed availability and storage
Discuss collaboration with the government for seedlings and funding
Highlight the need for processing facilities to add value

tasks.task: Kitchen segment with Anna (a debutante singer)
subtasks: Prepare rice and chicken with chili peppers
Discuss personal background in music and promotion
Share advice on supporting local farmers and music artists
Collaborate on cooking and tasting the dish
Promote distribution opportunities for Lizzie Tomato Mix
